About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Struggling to find my purpose, I spent some years desperately trying to discover my passion. Without a hope, I enrolled in a Bachelor of Information Technology at AIT college, Sydney , Australia. I started learning code and got comfortable with some basics. I realized that I have never been so joyful than the moment when I successfully wrote a relatively complicated feature that I wasn't sure I could pull off. It feels like I just ‘leveled up’ . Finding the bugs and resolving a bug that I’ve never dealt with before, feels me smarter afterwards. With all of these contentments, I never stopped learning new programming skills and languages. This passion has since lasted and lead to my decision to become a successful developer. Early I started creating websites for friends and just for fun as well. As a self-taught developer, I enjoy learning development more than any other fields. Beside that, I have a passion for fitness. I regularly workout to keep me fit, maintain self-confidence and to stay motivated towards my goal.

Freelancer

Full Stack Developer

I have build dozens of small projects for some practice and created some large projects for a business solution like ecommerce application and project management application. Technologies that I mostly used for front-end are HTML, CSS, SASS, React, Redux, React-Native, etc. And, for backend I mostly use NodeJs, Express, MongoDB, MySQL, etc.

Academic degree

Bachelor of Information Technology (BIT)

Enrolled in BIT at AIT (Academy of Information Technology), Ultimo, NSW 2007, Australia in (March 2018) for 1 year. I completed remaining course from KOI (King's Own Institute), Market St, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia in (2020 November).
